channel.title: How do I add npc that gambles on PI?
channel.description: When you click on a npc it asks you if you want to gamble or need and you need 1m , if you click "yes" it gives u a random item from a list of item ids and if you pick "no" it doesn't do anything.

item.title: How do I add npc that gambles on PI?
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

When you click on a npc it asks you if you want to gamble or need and you need 1m , if you click “yes” it gives u a random item from a list of item ids and if you pick “no” it doesn’t do anything.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add npc that gambles on PI?
